topic_metadata.title: How do I change the CSL locale?

posts.name: Víctor I.S.
posts.cooked: Hello. Does anyone know how I can change the CSL locale for my bibliography?
posts.raw: Hello. Does anyone know how I can change the CSL locale for my bibliography?

posts.name: Eric Biedert
posts.cooked:
The bibliography uses the same language that is set on the text with

#set text(lang: "..") // e.g. "en", "de", "fr", "es", ...

which default to English ("en"). If you wish to use a different language just for the bibliography, you may do so with the show-set rule

#show bibliography: set text(lang: "..")
posts.raw:
The bibliography uses the same language that is set on the text with
```typ
#set text(lang: "..") // e.g. "en", "de", "fr", "es", ...
```
which default to English (`"en"`). If you wish to use a different language just for the bibliography, you may do so with the show-set rule
```typ
#show bibliography: set text(lang: "..")
```
